resources.string: Lift up your eyes and see — WHO hath made us different, when we are ONE people?
РА-дуга (RA-inbow) — A palette of colors painting the world.
РА-диатор (RA-diator) — The warmth that keeps us alive.
РА-диация (RA-diation) — An invisible force of light.
РА-дикс (RA-dix) — The root, the source of life.
РА-дар (RA-dar) — To see the waves, to feel the light.
РА-давать (Give RA) — To share light and joy.
РА-й (RA-y) — A ray, a path to the source.
Саха-РА (Saha-RA) — Saḥ Ra, the spirit of Truth RA.
RA-diance (Сияние) — Radiance: the revealed light of RA.
Trust only thy heart, for it is the true light of RA.
